question: Which panel has recently been appointed by the Rajya Sabha Chairman regarding the two channels of the Parliament- RSTV and LSTV?
explanation:
Surya Prakash Committee is a panel appointed by the Rajya Sabha Chairman in consultation with the Lok Sabha Speaker to work out modalities regarding the two channels of the Parliament- RSTV and LSTV.
The committee had suggested that the Parliament have a single channel by merging the two. It also suggested the use of 2 platforms for broadcast in Hindi and English.
